entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
